function merge(r1, c1, r2, c2) {
  // (r1, c1)ì´ ë¹„ì—ˆë‹¤ë©´ (r2, c2)ë¡œ ë³‘í•©ë˜ì–´ì•¼ í•˜ë¯€ë¡œ
  // r2ë¥¼ r1ìœ¼ë¡œ, c2ë¥¼ c1ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€ê²½í•˜ê³  ë°˜ëŒ€ë¡œë„ ì ìš©í•œë‹¤.(êµ¬ì¡° ë¶„í•´ í• ë‹¹ ì‚¬ìš©)
  if (arr[r1][c1] === "EMPTY" && arr[r2][c2] !== "EMPTY")
    [r1, c1, r2, c2] = [r2, c2, r1, c1];

  // ê°±ì‹ ë˜ëŠ” ê°’ì€ (r1, c1)ì´ ê°€ì§„ ê°’ì´ë‹¤.
  let new_value = arr[r1][c1];

  // ë‹¨ìˆœíˆ (r2, c2)ì˜ ì°¸ì¡° ê°’ë§Œ ë³€ê²½í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì•„ë‹ˆë‹¤.
  // (r2, c2)ê°€ ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ë˜ ê°’(ë³‘í•©ë‹¹í•œ ì…€ì˜ ìœ„ì¹˜)ê³¼ ê·¸ ì…€ì„ ì°¸ì¡°í•˜ëŠ” ëª¨ë“  ì…€ë“¤ì˜ ì°¸ì¡° ê°’ì„ (r1, c1)ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°±ì‹ í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
  let change_pointer = parent[r2][c2];

  for (let i = 1; i <= 50; i++) {
    for (let j = 1; j <= 50; j++) {
      if (parent[i][j] === change_pointer) {

}

function solution(commands) {
  const answer = [];

  commands.forEach((command) => {
    const [cmd, option1, option2, option3, option4] = command.split(" ");
    switch (cmd) {
      case "UPDATE":
        if (option3) {

        } else {
          update_2(option1, option2);
        }
        break;
      case "MERGE":
        merge(option1, option2, option3, option4);
        break;
      case "UNMERGE":
        unmerge(option1, option2);
        break;
      case "PRINT":
        print(option1, option2);
        break;
    }
  });

  return answer;
}

function solution(commands) {
  const answer = [];
  const parent = Array.from({ length: 51 }, (_, i) =>
    Array.from({ length: 51 }, (_, j) => `${i},${j}`)
  );
  const arr = Array.from({ length: 51 }, () =>
    Array.from({ length: 51 }, () => "EMPTY")
  );

  function update_1(r, c, value) {
    for (let i = 1; i <= 50; i++) {
      for (let j = 1; j <= 50; j++) {
        if (parent[i][j] === parent[r][c]) arr[i][j] = value;
      }
    }
  }

  function update_2(value1, value2) {
    for (let i = 1; i <= 50; i++) {
      for (let j = 1; j <= 50; j++) {
        if (arr[i][j] === value1) arr[i][j] = value2;
      }
    }
  }

  function merge(r1, c1, r2, c2) {
    if (arr[r1][c1] === "EMPTY" && arr[r2][c2] !== "EMPTY")
      [r1, c1, r2, c2] = [r2, c2, r1, c1];

    let new_value = arr[r1][c1];
    let change_pointer = parent[r2][c2];

    for (let i = 1; i <= 50; i++) {
      for (let j = 1; j <= 50; j++) {
        if (parent[i][j] === change_pointer) {
          parent[i][j] = parent[r1][c1];
          arr[i][j] = new_value;
        }
      }
    }
  }

  function unmerge(r, c) {
    let value = arr[r][c];
    let change_pointer = parent[r][c];

    for (let i = 1; i <= 50; i++) {
      for (let j = 1; j <= 50; j++) {
        if (parent[i][j] === change_pointer) {
          parent[i][j] = `${i},${j}`;
          arr[i][j] = "EMPTY";
        }
      }
    }
    arr[r][c] = value;
  }

  function print(r, c) {
    answer.push(arr[r][c]);
  }

  commands.forEach((command) => {
    const [cmd, option1, option2, option3, option4] = command.split(" ");
    switch (cmd) {
      case "UPDATE":
        if (option3) {
          update_1(option1, option2, option3);
        } else {
          update_2(option1, option2);
        }
        break;
      case "MERGE":
        merge(option1, option2, option3, option4);
        break;
      case "UNMERGE":
        unmerge(option1, option2);
        break;
      case "PRINT":
        print(option1, option2);
        break;
    }
  });

  return answer;
}

const getPermutations = (arr, length) => {
  const result = [];
  if (length === 1) return arr.map((v) => [v]);

  arr.forEach((fixed, index, origin) => {
    const permutations = getPermutations(origin, length - 1);
    const attached = permutations.map((res) => [fixed, ...res]);

    result.push(...attached);
  });

  return result;
};

  users.forEach((user) => {

    // ğŸ‘‡ total : í˜„ì¬ ì‚¬ìš©ìê°€ ì´ëª¨í‹°ì½˜ í”ŒëŸ¬ìŠ¤ ê°€ì…í•˜ê¸°ë¡œ í•œ ìµœì†Œ ê¸ˆì•¡
    const [rate, total] = user;

    emoticons.forEach((emoticon, index) => {

      if (permutation[index] >= rate) {

        // 10,20,30,40ì€ í• ì¸ìœ¨ì´ë¯€ë¡œ 100ì—ì„œ í• ì¸ìœ¨ì„ ëº€ ê°’ì˜ ë°±ë¶„ìœ¨ë¡œ ê³„ì‚°í•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.

const solution = (users, emoticons) => {
  const obj = {};

  getPermutations([10, 20, 30, 40], emoticons.length).forEach((permutation) => {
    let plusUser = 0;
    let sales = 0;

    users.forEach((user) => {
      // ...

    // ì´ëª¨í‹°ì½˜ í”ŒëŸ¬ìŠ¤ ê°€ì…ì ìˆ˜ê°€ ê°€ì¥ í° ê°’ì„ ì–»ì–´ì•¼ í•˜ë¯€ë¡œ ê°€ì…ì ìˆ˜ë¥¼ keyë¡œ ì§€ì •í•˜ê³  ë¹ˆ ë°°ì—´ë¡œ ì´ˆê¸°í™”í•œë‹¤.
    if (!obj[plusUser]) {

    // ì´ëª¨í‹°ì½˜ í”ŒëŸ¬ìŠ¤ ê°€ì…ì ìˆ˜ê°€ ë™ì¼í•˜ê³  ë§¤ì¶œì•¡ì€ ë‹¤ë¥¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ ë§¤ì¶œì•¡ì€ ë°°ì—´ì˜ ìš”ì†Œë¡œ ìŒ“ì•„ë‘”ë‹¤.
    obj[plusUser].push(sales);

  let maxPlusUser = 0;

  //Math.maxë¡œ objì˜ key ì¤‘ ìµœëŒ€ê°’ì„ ì–»ëŠ”ë‹¤. ì´ëª¨í‹°ì½˜ í”ŒëŸ¬ìŠ¤ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ê°€ì…ìë¥¼ ìµœëŒ€í•œ ëŠ˜ë¦° ê²½ìš°ì¸ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤.
  Object.keys(obj).forEach((key) => {

  //ì´ëª¨í‹°ì½˜ í”ŒëŸ¬ìŠ¤ ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ ê°€ì…ìê°€ ê°€ì¥ ë§ë‹¤ë©´ ê·¸ ë‹¤ìŒìœ¼ë¡œ ë§¤ì¶œì•¡ì´ ì»¤ì•¼ í•œë‹¤. ê·¸ëŸ¬ë¯€ë¡œ obj[key] ë°°ì—´ì—ì„œ ìµœëŒ€ê°’ì„ ì°¾ì•„ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.
  maxSales = Math.max(...obj[maxPlusUser]);

    let sales = 0;

    users.forEach((user) => {
      const [rate, total] = user;
      let tempAmount = 0;

      emoticons.forEach((emoticon, index) => {
        if (permutation[index] >= rate) {
          tempAmount += emoticon * ((100 - permutation[index]) / 100);
        }
      });

      if (tempAmount >= total) {
        plusUser++;
      } else {
        sales += tempAmount;
      }
    });

    if (!obj[plusUser]) {
      obj[plusUser] = [];
    }

    obj[plusUser].push(sales);
  });

  let maxPlusUser = 0;
  let maxSales = 0;

  Object.keys(obj).forEach((key) => {
    maxPlusUser = Math.max(maxPlusUser, key);
  });

  maxSales = Math.max(...obj[maxPlusUser]);

  return [maxPlusUser, maxSales];
};

const getPermutations = (arr, length) => {
  const result = [];
  if (length === 1) return arr.map((v) => [v]);

  arr.forEach((fixed, index, origin) => {
    const permutations = getPermutations(origin, length - 1);
    const attached = permutations.map((res) => [fixed, ...res]);

    result.push(...attached);
  });

  return result;
};
